name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
image: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-air adventure across vast fields, forests, and mountain ranges, with a focus on exploration and survival in a revitalized Hyrule.

name: Super Mario 64
description: The first 3D platformer in the Super Mario series, allowing players to explore vast worlds filled with secrets and challenges.

name: Tetris
description: The iconic puzzle game where players arrange falling tetromino pieces to clear lines. Simple but highly addictive gameplay.

name: Portal 2
description: A mind-bending puzzle game with a dark humor story, utilizing physics-defying portal mechanics and challenging spatial reasoning.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: One of the most influential 2D platformers, introducing new power-ups, levels, and enemies to the Super Mario franchise.

name: Pac-Man
description: The iconic arcade game where players navigate a maze, eating pellets and avoiding ghosts. A classic that popularized the video game industry.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
system: PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows
description: An open-world action-adventure game set in a satirical recreation of modern Southern California. Allows players to switch between three protagonists.

name: Super Mario World
description: A landmark 2D platformer for the SNES, introducing new power-ups, enemies, and the dinosaur companion Yoshi to the Mario franchise.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic western open-world game with a gripping story about the outlaw Van der Linde gang's tragic downfall.

name: The Last of Us
description: A gripping post-apocalyptic story following survivors Joel and Ellie as they trek across a ravaged United States. Acclaimed for its storytelling and characters.

name: Minecraft
description: An open-world sandbox game where players can build, explore and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated world. One of the best-selling games of all time.

name: Half-Life 2
description: A revolutionary first-person shooter praised for its advanced physics, graphics, and narrative, following the rebel scientist Gordon Freeman.

name: Super Smash Bros. Melee
description: A beloved fighting game featuring characters from various Nintendo franchises battling across iconic stages. Praised for its depth and competitive scene.

name: Resident Evil 4
system: GameCube, PlayStation 2, Microsoft Windows, Wii, Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
description: A genre-defining survival horror game that revolutionized over-the-shoulder third-person shooter gameplay. Follows Leon S. Kennedy's mission to rescue the President's daughter.

name: Super Mario 64
description: The first 3D platformer in the Super Mario series, allowing players to explore vast worlds filled with secrets and challenges.

name: BioShock
system: Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, Microsoft Windows, Xbox One, PlayStation 4
description: A critically acclaimed first-person shooter set in the underwater city of Rapture, blending thrilling combat with a gripping narrative and exploration.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
system: Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch
description: An epic open-world fantasy RPG set in the province of Skyrim, allowing players to forge their own path with countless quests and customization options.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
system: PlayStation 2, Xbox, Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360, iOS, Android, Xbox Cloud Gaming
description: An influential open-world action game set in a satirical recreation of early 1990s Los Angeles, following the story of Carl Johnson returning to his old gang life.

name: Super Mario Odyssey
description: An open-world 3D platformer where Mario explores various kingdoms aided by his new companion Cappy, who allows him to capture and control objects and enemies.

name: God of War
description: A soft reboot of the God of War series, following an older Kratos and his son Atreus on a journey through the Norse realms after the death of Kratos' wife.

name: Metal Gear Solid
description: The pioneering stealth action game that popularized the genre, following Solid Snake's mission to neutralize a nuclear threat on a remote island. Praised for its cinematic storytelling.

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
description: The game that revitalized the Call of Duty franchise with its gripping modern-day storyline and refined first-person shooter gameplay.

name: Super Mario Bros.
description: The iconic 2D platformer that helped establish the video game industry, following Mario's quest to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
image: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: The critically acclaimed and influential 3D action-adventure game that defined the Zelda franchise, following Link's journey through time to stop Ganondorf's evil plans.

name: Doom
description: The groundbreaking first-person shooter that popularized the genre, pitting a space marine against the forces of Hell in intense, fast-paced combat.

name: Super Metroid
description: The acclaimed action-adventure game that defined the Metroidvania genre, following bounty hunter Samus Aran's mission to defeat the Space Pirates on the planet Zebes.

name: Street Fighter II
description: The iconic fighting game that revived the genre and popularized competitive multiplayer, allowing players to choose from a diverse roster of world warriors.
